properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
'Njao mandona moramora
Ny Mpanjakan-danitra.
Efa alim-be ny ora ;
O ! vohay, vohay izao !

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Efa ela no nandona
'Lay fitiavan-dehibe ;
Mitaraina toa mifona,
O ! vohay, vohay izao.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Moa tsy renao, sa tsy tianao
Hovohana Izy re ?
'Ndrao dia lasa ka tsy renao
O ! vohay, vohay izao.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Kely sisa no ho renao
Ny fandonany izao.
Aza ela, mitsangana,
O ! vohay, ny Tomponao.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Ry Mpamonjiko malala
Diso aho hatrizao ;
Fa nandà tsy hahalala
Nt harem-pitiavanao.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
He ! vohako re, ry Tompo
Dieny mbola re ny feo ;
Mandrosoa ao am-poko,
Manjakà irery ao.
